channel.title: Putting together a team! ~ We have Lifetime VPS, And Webhost + Domain
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2yju6h3.png[/img]
Forums: [url=http://www.adrenaline-ps.com/community]Adrenaline Community[/url] Contact me at: adrenaline_ltd on skype or PM ME HERE
INTRO: [SPOILER=Intro]Adrenaline_Ltd has been in development since 2012 and has kept it going for some reason. We strive to bring players amazing content that's never been seen before! Adrenaline has a privately owned VPS (Virtual Private Server) currently running in our Lead Developers basement, So our server will always be online no matter what. Our Lead Developer is Vegas, He handles our security for the server/website/forums/VPS (penetration tester) our Team Administrator is Steele, He's our creative thinker, And keeps our team on track and working hard. And our amazing Owner, The one who started Adrenaline in 2012 is Jonathan, All ideas and work must pass through him (steele and vegas too) before implementing it anywhere, This is just to make sure that it is not something that will be under-used or forgotten, And so that we know what exactly is in our server. BEST OF ALL! We try not leech any work by other developers, Meaning you write your own code and add your author tags[/SPOILER]
DEVELOPERS NEEDED: [SPOILER=DEVELOPERS NEEDED]GFX designer Source + Client developer ~ either or website/forums developer ~ must know how to add highscores and stuff like that Creative thinkers[/SPOILER]
SERVER CONTENT: [SPOILER=CONTENT]Vorago Clean cache ~ removed thousands of useless sprites No black screen ~ 90% of the time, when someone gets black screened it only lasts a few second or up to 3 minutes and 40 seconds max Teleport activation Squeal of Fortune 100% Grand Exchange started custom starter tutorial ~ Finished, just have to figure out why it doesn't work Christmas Cracker Started party room fight caves fight kiln ~ have to figure out why it doesn't let you through the entrance duel arena
Thats all the content for now until we get our project running smoothly[/SPOILER]
IMAGES: [SPOILER=IMAGES]on my tablet posting this, But i will post images as soon as i get on my computer![/SPOILER][/center]

item.title: Putting together a team! ~ We have Lifetime VPS, And Webhost + Domain

item.title: Putting together a team! ~ We have Lifetime VPS, And Webhost + Domain
item.dc:creator: @adrenaline-ltd adrenaline-ltd
item.description:
@adrenaline-ltd wrote:

[center]

Forums: Adrenaline Community
Contact me at: adrenaline_ltd on skype or PM ME HERE

INTRO:
[SPOILER=Intro]Adrenaline_Ltd has been in development since 2012 and has kept it going for some reason. We strive to bring players amazing content that’s never been seen before!
Adrenaline has a privately owned VPS (Virtual Private Server) currently running in our Lead Developers basement, So our server will always be online no matter what.
Our Lead Developer is Vegas, He handles our security for the server/website/forums/VPS (penetration tester)
our Team Administrator is Steele, He’s our creative thinker, And keeps our team on track and working hard.
And our amazing Owner, The one who started Adrenaline in 2012 is Jonathan, All ideas and work must pass through him (steele and vegas too) before implementing it anywhere, This is just to make sure that it is not something that will be under-used or forgotten, And so that we know what exactly is in our server.
BEST OF ALL! We try not leech any work by other developers, Meaning you write your own code and add your author tags[/SPOILER]

DEVELOPERS NEEDED:
[SPOILER=DEVELOPERS NEEDED]GFX designer
Source + Client developer ~ either or
website/forums developer ~ must know how to add highscores and stuff like that
Creative thinkers[/SPOILER]

SERVER CONTENT:
[SPOILER=CONTENT]Vorago
Clean cache ~ removed thousands of useless sprites
No black screen ~ 90% of the time, when someone gets black screened it only lasts a few second or up to 3 minutes and 40 seconds max
Teleport activation
Squeal of Fortune
100% Grand Exchange
started custom starter tutorial ~ Finished, just have to figure out why it doesn’t work
Christmas Cracker
Started party room
fight caves
fight kiln ~ have to figure out why it doesn’t let you through the entrance
duel arena

Thats all the content for now until we get our project running smoothly[/SPOILER]

IMAGES:
[SPOILER=IMAGES]on my tablet posting this, But i will post images as soon as i get on my computer![/SPOILER][/center]

Read full topic
